homepage.tagline1: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
homepage.tagline2: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
homepage.secret_hint: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.
homepage.secret_form_more_text3: and be able to send the secret by email.
homepage.cta_subtitle: Elevate your brand and share with confidence
homepage.need_free_account: Just getting started? Send emails with a free account.
homepage.password_generation_description: Click "Generate Password" to create a secure random password that you can share.
homepage.protip1: Your message will self-destruct after being viewed. The link can only be accessed once.

authonly.tagline2: Secure messaging service is for internal use only.
authonly.tagline1: If you have an account, please log in to continue.

disabled.tagline2: This service is setup for internal use only.
disabled.tagline1: User interface and login capabilities are not available.

homepage.secure_your_brand_build_customer_trust_e: Secure your brand, build customer trust with links from your domain.
homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sensitive_informa: A trusted way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after being viewed.
homepage.send_sensitive_information_that_can_only: Send sensitive information that can only be viewed once
homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_only_authoriz: This is a private instance. Only authorized team members can generate new secure links.
homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_share_sensitive_: Onetime Secret helps us share sensitive information securely while maintaining our professional facade.
homepage.information_shared_through_this_service_: Information shared through this service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted to ensure confidentiality.
